Html: hi, i was able to build a dll for rte but for some reason, i can't use it.i just followed the instruction in the home section of this project, i put the .dll file inside my bin directory. i have this before the contentplaceholder <%@ Register Assembly="RichTextEditor" Namespace="RichTextEditor" TagPrefix="cc1" %> and then inside the placeholder, i have this <cc1:RichTextEditor ID="Rte1" Theme="Blue" runat="server" />. i have unknown server tag error. please help me.im not really sure what the problem is. thanks in advance.

You need to modify namespace.

<%@ Register Assembly="RichTextEditor" Namespace="AjaxControls" TagPrefix="cc1" %>
